3973.verse: كَمْ|How many|88|98|1840$أَهْلَكْنَا|We destroyed|112|133|5422$مِن قَبْلِهِم|before them|107|128|1094$مِّن|of|50|71|53$قَرْنٍ|a generation,|108|129|11275$فَنَادَواْ|then they called out|155|166|14759$وَّلَاتَ|when there (was) no longer|204|282|14760$حِينَ|time|62|218|5281$مَنَاصٍ|(for) escape.|107|185|14761$

3974.verse: وَعَجِبُوٓاْ|And they wonder|133|140|14762$أَن|that|48|62|655$جَآءَهُم|has come to them|140|154|853$مُّنذِرٌ|a warner|78|92|9348$مِّنْهُمْ‌ۖ|from among themselves.|181|195|730$وَقَالَ|And said|76|83|1089$ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ|the disbelievers,|128|178|4590$هَـٰذَا|`This|59|160|248$سَـٰحِرٌ|(is) a magician,|122|223|14763$كَذَّابٌ|a liar.|74|124|14764$

3975.verse: أَجَعَلَ|Has he made|105|119|14765$ٱلْأَلِهَةَ|the gods|78|105|14766$إِلَـٰهًا وَٲحِدًا‌ۖ|(into) one god?|126|153|7533$إِنَّ|Indeed|65|92|58$هَـٰذَا|this|59|86|248$لَشَىْءٌ|(is) certainly a thing|155|169|8617$عُجَابٌ|curious.`|84|84|14767$

3976.verse: وَٱنطَلَقَ|And went forth|120|128|14768$ٱلْمَلَأُ|the chiefs|86|102|6487$مِنْهُمْ|among them|101|117|730$أَنِ|that,|53|69|4149$ٱمْشُواْ|`Continue,|91|107|14769$وَٱصْبِرُواْ|and be patient|117|133|6726$عَلَىٰٓ|over|63|71|52$ءَالِهَتِكُمْ‌ۖ|your gods.|92|120|14770$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|127|58$هَـٰذَا|this|59|116|248$لَشَىْءٌ|(is) certainly a thing|155|212|8617$يُرَادُ|intended.|82|110|14771$

3979.verse: أَمْ|Or|38|51|62$عِندَهُمْ|have they|87|113|6910$خَزَآئِنُ|(the) treasures|121|147|5610$رَحْمَةِ|(of the) Mercy|117|143|3157$رَبِّكَ|(of) your Lord|112|138|1322$ٱلْعَزِيزِ|the All-Mighty,|118|131|3257$ٱلْوَهَّابِ|the Bestower?|115|115|14776$

3980.verse: أَمْ|Or|38|51|62$لَهُم|for them|76|101|98$مُّلْكُ|(is the) dominion|131|156|1005$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|(of) the heavens|132|157|351$وَٱلْأَرْضِ|and the earth|111|136|352$وَمَا|and whatever|111|124|46$بَيْنَهُمَا‌ۖ|(is) between them?|149|185|3978$فَلْيَرْتَقُواْ|Then let them ascend|165|237|14777$فِى|by|48|120|89$ٱلْأَسْبَـٰبِ|the means.|96|132|14778$

3983.verse: وَثَمُودُ|And Thamud|102|119|12124$وَقَوْمُ|and (the) people|131|166|12125$لُوطٍ|(of) Lut|71|106|8607$وَأَصْحَـٰبُ|and (the) companions|165|200|12126$لْــَٔيْكَةِ‌ۚ|(of) the wood.|117|134|13044$أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|Those|82|294|51$ٱلْأَحْزَابُ|(were) the companies.|170|382|11187$

3971.verse: Sad. By the Qur'an containing reminder...

3972.verse: But those who disbelieve are in pride and dissension.

3973.verse: How many a generation have We destroyed before them, and they [then] called out; but it was not a time for escape.

3974.verse: And they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves. And the disbelievers say, "This is a magician and a liar.

3975.verse: Has he made the gods [only] one God? Indeed, this is a curious thing."

3976.verse: And the eminent among them went forth, [saying], "Continue, and be patient over [the defense of] your gods. Indeed, this is a thing intended.

3977.verse: We have not heard of this in the latest religion. This is not but a fabrication.

3978.verse: Has the message been revealed to him out of [all of] us?" Rather, they are in doubt about My message. Rather, they have not yet tasted My punishment.

3979.verse: Or do they have the depositories of the mercy of your Lord, the Exalted in Might, the Bestower?

3980.verse: Or is theirs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and what is between them? Then let them ascend through [any] ways of access.

3981.verse: [They are but] soldiers [who will be] defeated there among the companies [of disbelievers].

3982.verse: The people of Noah denied before them, and [the tribe of] 'Aad and Pharaoh, the owner of stakes,

3983.verse: And [the tribe of] Thamud and the people of Lot and the companions of the thicket. Those are the companies.

3984.verse: Each of them denied the messengers, so My penalty was justified.

3985.verse: And these [disbelievers] await not but one blast [of the Horn]; for it there will be no delay.

3986.verse: And they say, "Our Lord, hasten for us our share [of the punishment] before the Day of Account"
